column4: hi, i'm trying to install windows xp sp3 but it tells that it cant detect the drive - do you know about this? (ubuntu is installed there)
sata hardisk?  (The Windows install might need a 3rd parity disk)
like what, another cd? its ibm computer (portable)
when you install windows it has a prompt about driver disks.  You should have got a floppy or something probably.
